headline: PTC FlexPLM Win With SPG Highlights Cloud Growth And Valuation Gap
summary: PTC (NasdaqGS:PTC) has been selected by SPG Company to provide its FlexPLM solution. SPG Company is replacing its legacy product lifecycle management system with PTC's cloud based FlexPLM platform. The partnership focuses on modernizing product lifecycle operations and supporting SPG Company's digital transformation goals. For you as an investor, this FlexPLM win adds another data point to how PTC positions itself in product lifecycle management software. The company focuses on cloud based...
